document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">over </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Jordan, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Genesis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">record, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">An </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Angel </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Wrestler </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Did </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">wrestle </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">long </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">hard. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Till, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">morning </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">touching </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">mountain, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Jacob </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">waxing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">strong, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Angel </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">begged </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">permission </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">breakfast </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">return. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">quoth </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#04c8ff">wily </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Jacob </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">girt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">his </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">loins </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">anew, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"Until </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">bless </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">stranger!" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">which </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">acceded </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to: </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Light </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">swung </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">silver </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">fleeces </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Peniel </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">hills </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">among, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">astonished </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Wrestler </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">Found </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">he </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">had </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0ff5c">worsted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">God! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: A little over Jordan
